summary: Comprehensive testing of Admin Members page enhancements. Backend: 17/17 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All UI flows tested and working - Members list with Plan/Expiry columns, avatar thumbnails, status filter, search, multi-select bulk delete, column sorting, member detail sheet with Disable/Enable, Reset Password, Revoke Membership actions.

issues: Minor React hydration warning in console: '<span> cannot be a child of <tbody>' - This is an Emergent preview environment artifact and doesn't affect functionality

passed_tests: Backend: GET /admin/users-with-membership returns members with plan/expiry data - 200 OK
Backend: Membership data structure contains plan_name, start_date, end_date, status
Backend: Filter by status 'active' returns only members with active memberships
Backend: Filter by status 'inactive' returns only members without memberships
Backend: Search by name works correctly
Backend: Search by member_id works correctly
Backend: POST /admin/users/{id}/toggle-status disable works - 200 OK
Backend: POST /admin/users/{id}/toggle-status enable works - 200 OK
Backend: Cannot disable admin user - 400 Rejected
Backend: POST /admin/users/{id}/reset-password works - 200 OK, new password functional
Backend: Reset password validation (min 6 chars) - 400 Rejected for short passwords
Backend: Reset password for non-existent user - 404 Not Found
Backend: POST /admin/users/bulk-delete deletes multiple users - 200 OK
Backend: Bulk delete with empty list - 200 OK, 0 deleted
Backend: POST /admin/users/{id}/revoke-membership works - 200 OK
Backend: Revoke membership for user without membership - 400 Rejected
Backend: POST /users creates member with notification sent (background) - 200 OK
UI: Members list page loads with Plan and Expiry columns
UI: Avatar thumbnails display with default male/female dicebear icons
UI: Status filter works (All, Active, Inactive, Disabled)
UI: Search by name/member_id works
UI: Multi-select checkbox selection works
UI: Bulk delete button appears when members selected
UI: Column sorting works for Member ID, Name, Phone, Plan, Expiry
UI: Member detail sheet opens with full info
UI: Reset Password dialog opens with password input
UI: Disable/Enable User button present in detail sheet
UI: Revoke Membership button present for members with active plans
UI: Add Member form loads with all required fields
UI: Welcome notification note displayed on Add Member form
seed_data_creation: Backend tests create TEST_ prefixed users which are cleaned up after each test
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Members page fully functional: 1) Members list shows plan_name and end_date from active_membership object, 2) Avatar thumbnails use dicebear API for male/female defaults, 3) All CRUD actions work: disable/enable user, reset password, revoke membership, bulk delete, 4) Status filter queries backend with status param (active/inactive/disabled), 5) Notifications sent via Email and WhatsApp on member creation and password reset.

members_list_with_plan_expiry.details: Plan name and expiry date displayed in table columns, '-' shown for members without plans

avatar_thumbnails.details: Using dicebear API for default male/female avatars based on gender field

column_sorting.details: All sortable columns (Member ID, Name, Phone, Plan, Expiry) working with asc/desc toggle

status_filter.details: Filters: all, active (with plan), inactive (no plan), disabled - all functional

multi_select_bulk_delete.details: Checkbox selection, bulk delete button appears with count, confirms deletion

member_detail_sheet.details: Opens on row click, shows all info including membership with revoke option

disable_enable_user.details: Toggle status API works, sends notification to user via Email/WhatsApp

admin_reset_password.details: Sets new password and sends notification with credentials to user

revoke_membership.details: Changes membership status to 'revoked', sends notification

welcome_notification_on_create.details: Note displayed on form, backend sends Email + WhatsApp with login credentials
